name: Kuru Kuru Kururin
description:
Kuru Kuru Kururin (くるくるくるりん, also spelled kurukuru kururin) is a puzzle video game developed by Eighting and published by Nintendo for the Game Boy Advance handheld video game console.
A simple concept with a completely awesome challenge! Easy to learn but difficult to master, once you start you'll never be able to stop! Attempt to reach the goal, by navigating the rotating helicopter through increasingly narrow labyrinths while avoiding the moving obstacles. Every mission needs a steady hand and nerves of steel! Enjoy multi-player action with a single Game Pack, simply link multiple Game Boy Advance systems and race against your friends!
